shorts.title: VFW convention held in Gettysburg
shorts.description: The Department of Pennsylvania, Veterans of Foreign Wars, conducted a department convention in Gettysburg. Those who attended included, from left: Robert Eiler, past department commander; Michael G. McLane, VFW Post 7069, Clarks Summit, department inspector; Carol Whitmore, incoming national VFW commander-in-chief, and Russell Canevari, VFW Post 5544, Jessup, past department commander.
shorts.content: The Department of Pennsylvania, Veterans of Foreign Wars, conducted a department convention in Gettysburg. Those who attended included, from left: Robert Eiler, past department commander; Michael G. McLane, VFW Post 7069, Clarks Summit, department inspector; Carol Whitmore, incoming national VFW commander-in-chief, and Russell Canevari, VFW Post 5544, Jessup, past department commander.
shorts.content_distilled: Department of Pennsylvania, Veterans of Foreign Wars, conducted a department convention in Gettysburg.

shorts.title: Toyota of Scranton supports Scranton Jazz Festival
shorts.title_distilled: Toyota of Scranton supports Scranton Jazz Festival.
shorts.description: Toyota of Scranton is supporting the 20th annual Scranton Jazz Festival, to be held at various venues in downtown Scranton this weekend. From left: Patrick Rogers, chief financial officer, Toyota of Scranton; Marko Marcinko, founder/director, Scranton Jazz Festival; and Larry Pugliese, Scranton Jazz Festival.
shorts.content: Toyota of Scranton is supporting the 20th annual Scranton Jazz Festival, to be held at various venues in downtown Scranton this weekend. From left: Patrick Rogers, chief financial officer, Toyota of Scranton; Marko Marcinko, founder/director, Scranton Jazz Festival; and Larry Pugliese, Scranton Jazz Festival.
